title: Golden eye
data:

| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A tiny and shimmering floating eye, swift as the wind and glistening like gold. It has a peculiarly hypnotic look.***“No coveting nor envy burns In thy bright golden eye, That calm and innocently turns On all below the sky.” -Hannah Flagg Gould, \_The Youth’s Coronal\_ |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Golden eyes** are fast, constantly-blinking pack enemies that do no damage, but try to [confuse](/Confusion "Confusion") you with their gaze if they can overcome your [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"). They can be found in [the Slime Pits](/The_Slime_Pits "The Slime Pits"), [Abyss](/Abyss "Abyss"), and can be summoned by a few enemies through the [Summon Eyeballs](/Summon_Eyeballs "Summon Eyeballs") spell.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                    |                                                                                                            |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Confusion Gaze](/Confusion_Gaze "Confusion Gaze") | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Instant flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Blink](/Blink "Blink")                            | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                       |

## Tips & Tricks

- Having at least Will+++ or [clarity](/Clarity "Clarity") will render them harmless.
- [Wands of iceblast](/Wand_of_iceblast "Wand of iceblast") and [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball") are excellent for bypassing their annoying [EV](/EV "EV") at range, but mind the [noise](/Noise "Noise").
- [Airstrike](/Airstrike "Airstrike") will usually one-shot them, given their low HP, lack of AC, and flight.

## History

- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), golden eyes couldn't [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible").
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), they were immune to magic.
html:
Golden eye

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.26: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all eyeballs, see list of eyeballs.

golden eye G 
HP 7-16
HD 6
XP 190
Speed 13
AC 0
EV 20
Will 60



Resistances rDrown
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Tiny
Type giant eyeball, golden eye
Flags See invisible
Flying
Unbreathing
Batty
A tiny and shimmering floating eye, swift as the wind and glistening like gold. It has a peculiarly hypnotic look.

“No coveting nor envy burns
In thy bright golden eye,
That calm and innocently turns
On all below the sky.”
-Hannah Flagg Gould, _The Youth’s Coronal_

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Golden eyes are fast, constantly-blinking pack enemies that do no damage, but try to confuse you with their gaze if they can overcome your willpower. They can be found in the Slime Pits, Abyss, and can be summoned by a few enemies through the Summon Eyeballs spell.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Confusion Gaze Magical flag,
Instant flag
Slot2 Blink Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Having at least Will+++ or clarity will render them harmless.
  • Wands of iceblast and Fireball are excellent for bypassing their annoying EV at range, but mind the noise.
  • Airstrike will usually one-shot them, given their low HP, lack of AC, and flight.

History

  • Prior to 0.18, golden eyes couldn't see invisible.
  • Prior to 0.16, they were immune to magic.
